name: Drow Nobility
prerequisiteFormula: "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow
descriptionText: Your blood courses with power, granting you greater spell-like abilities.
benefitText: You may use detect magic as a spell-like ability at will, and add feather fall and levitate to the spell-like abilities that you may use once each per day. Your caster level is equal to your character level.
